name: OpenStack Client (from pipx)
description: Install an up-to-date version of OpenStack client with pipx.

version.description: Select or enter an OpenStack client version.

barbican.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Barbican client version. To avoid installation use "none".

ceilometer.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Ceilometer client version. To avoid installation use "none".
